name: Summarization Faithfulness (News)
description: Evaluate if summaries preserve key facts from news articles.

rubric.name: faithfulness
rubric.desc: No invented facts; aligns with source.

dataset_rows.input: Article: OpenAI announced new features for its platform.
dataset_rows.expected: Summary mentions the features and release timeline.

dataset_rows.input: Article: The city council approved a $5M budget for parks.
dataset_rows.expected: Summary includes vote outcome and main allocations.
